General.Name: Reservoir Link Energy Bhd
General.Description: Reservoir Link Energy Bhd, an investment holding company, provides oil and gas well services in Malaysia and Mauritania. The company operates through two segments, Oil and Gas, and Renewable Energy. It offers well leak repair, well perforation, well testing, wireline, and well wash and cement services. The company's services also include supplying technical personnel and oilfield equipment, as well as specialized oilfield chemicals; and provision of construction and consultancy services, as well as providing oil and gas production enhancement services and sand management solutions. In addition, it offers engineering, construction, and installation of solar photovoltaic projects for residential, industrial, and commercial customers; and engages in the construction, operation, and maintenance of hydropower, biomass plant, and geothermal plants. Reservoir Link Energy Bhd was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
